forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Drizzle then Mostly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle before 9am. Mostly sunny. High near 69, with temperatures falling to around 66 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 9 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Drizzle
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle after midnight. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 12 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

weather_report:
The morning in Downtown San Francisco greets us with a gentle touch of optimism, as the clouds begin to lift ever so slightly over the horizon. While the air hints at the possibility of a light drizzle earlier in the day, the forecast assures a largely sunny disposition as the sun approaches its zenith. The warmth of approximately 69 degrees will usher in a comfortable afternoon, revealing a few hidden corners of the vibrant city. As you navigate the streets, anticipate breezy whispers from the west-southwest, a dynamic force that brings both a slight chill and a refreshing energy—perfect for an urban exploration.

As the day unfolds, the sun may struggle to fully dispel the remaining marine layer, potentially draping the Golden Gate Bridge in a delicate veil. Even as these clouds attempt to rally, the promise of an inviting evening settles in, one where the temperature gently slips to a mild 56 degrees. A light jacket will serve you well, as the west-southwest wind engages in a playful dance with the cooling dusk. For now, consider a leisurely stroll through the myriad parks of the city or perhaps a warm cup of coffee at a cozy café, embracing the soft light of the day as it unfolds into the mellower tones of twilight.
